Title: Ladies Rotary black leather strap and white dial watch LS00761
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ladies Rotary black leather strap and white dial watch LS00761 RRP £115.00 Now £75.00 Description This ladies Rotary watch has a traditional and timeless design. The slim black leather strap has a slightly glossy finish and features a crocodile skin effect. The strap measures 1cm wide and is fastened by a polished buckle. The polished stainless steel casing houses the small round dial. The casing and dial measure 25mm including the winder. Black numbers clearly mark the hours and stand out against the white dial colour. The numbers are in a slightly italicised font. The Rotary logo is prominently displayed just underneath the 12 o’clock hour marker and silver coloured hands show the time clearly. This ladies Rotary watch is classed as waterproof which means is can be worn whilst swimming. We are authorised stockists of Rotary watches and each watch is sold in the official branded packaging and is accompanied by a manufacturer’s warranty. This warranty covers the internal workings of the watch for the lifetime of the watch as long as you get it serviced under the instructions of the warranty. Chapelle reference 08131087 Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
